About.title: Identity Log
About.paragraph1: I build at the intersection of identity, code, and imagination, where every component is a signal in the constant exchange between human and machine. My work is modular, reactive, and wired with intent like circuits pulsing through a living interface.
About.paragraph2: I design systems that feel alive. Every pixel has a reason to exist. Every animation is a conversation. Whether it’s React, Tailwind, shaders, or state machines, my tools shape responsive, immersive experiences that feel as much as they function.
About.paragraph3: This isn’t just a portfolio. It’s a grid. A reflection of how I think, create, and connect. A space where creativity flows like data and interfaces hum with energy.

Contact.introTitle: You've reached HUMBLEFOOL'S transmission terminal, the neural gateway where code meets conversation.
Contact.uplinkMessage: Whether you're a fellow dev, an idea-crafter, or a recruiter from the future — this is your uplink. Fire a message, and I’ll route it through my neural grid.

sde2.title: Software Development Engineer 2
sde2.op1: Architected and shipped a scalable frontend used by 300K+ users using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, achieving 95+ Core Web Vitals across performance, SEO, and accessibility.
sde2.op2: Designed frontend architecture while leading cross-functional collaboration with product, backend, and design teams.
sde2.op3: Integrated PWA features to boost mobile engagement and user retention by 30%.
sde2.op4: Implemented Zustand for global state management and i18n for multilingual support across the app.
sde2.op5: Developed REST API integration workflows with a .NET-based backend, improving performance and maintainability.

sde1.title: Software Development Engineer 1
sde1.op1: Engineered and maintained a robust booking engine serving 10,000+ users, with high availability and responsive UX.
sde1.op2: Improved Lighthouse scores from 55 to 90+, cutting load time by ~45% through performance optimization.
sde1.op3: Enhanced SEO via semantic HTML, meta tags, structured data, and sitemaps, improving discoverability.
sde1.op4: Ensured WCAG accessibility compliance across all UI components using ARIA and keyboard support.
sde1.op5: Built features using React.js, Redux, SCSS, and Material UI, ensuring a modular, scalable frontend codebase.

intern.title: Software Development Intern
intern.op1: Integrated Google Analytics 4 to enable rich user behavior insights and data-driven UI decisions.
intern.op2: Implemented internationalization (i18n) for multilingual UI, expanding product accessibility for global users.
intern.op3: Built reusable UI components with React.js, aligning with design system guidelines.
intern.op4: Contributed to unit testing and code reviews, maintaining code quality and improving CI/CD confidence.

Footer.tagline: Architecting interfaces at the edge of imagination. Powered by code, curiosity & a little chaos.

Home.headline: Welcome to the Grid
Home.description: The Grid. A digital frontier. Neon circuits power systems built from logic, but shaped by creativity. It’s a space where identity is written in code and ideas evolve with every keystroke. Glitches don’t break things — they reveal them. This isn’t just a network; it’s a reflection of human imagination.
